addVaultPlaceholder.message: Vault jodne ke liye enter dabaein

alwaysShowHighlightsDescription.message: Page load hone par aapke save kiye gaye highlights dikhayein. Highlighter mode active hone par hi highlights dikhane ke liye band karein.

apiKeysWarning.message: External provider ka use karte samay, aap unki terms aur privacy policy se agree karte hain...

appendToDaily.message: Daily note mein, ant mein jodein

appendToExisting.message: Maujuda note mein, ant mein jodein

autoRunInterpreterDescription.message: Template me prompt variables hone par turant chalega. Is se aapke model provider ke API credits kharch honge. Agar aap interpreter ko sirf manually chalana chahte hain to ise band kar dein.

behaviorWarning.message: Maujuda note ya daily note mein jodne ke liye Obsidian 1.7.2 ya usse naya version chahiye.

cannotDeleteProvider.message: Provider "$1" ko nahi hata sakte kyunki yeh $2 model(s) dwara upyog kiya ja raha hai.

clipBehaviorDescription.message: Chunein ki highlight ki gayi samagri ko Obsidian mein kaise save kiya jaye. $strong_start${{content}}$strong_end$ variable ko define karta hai.

confirmDeleteTemplate.message: Kya aap template "$1" ko hatana chahte hain?

confirmReplaceSettings.message: Yeh aapki vartaman sabhi settings ko badal dega, jismein templates aur properties shamil hain. Kya aap jaari rakhna chahte hain?

copyAsJson.message: JSON ke roop mein copy karein

defaultInterpreterContextDescription.message: Prompt variables ki vyakhya ke liye upyog kiye jane wale context ko override karein. Yahan variables ka upyog kiya ja sakta hai.

deleteModelConfirm.message: Kya aap is model ko hatana chahte hain?

deleteProviderConfirm.message: Kya aap is provider ko hatana chahte hain?

dragAndDropFile.message: Yahan file drag aur drop karein

earlyAccessDescription.message: Obsidian ke latest $link_start$early access version$link_end$ ki zarurat wali features ka upyog karein. Vartaman mein Obsidian 1.7.2 ya usse naya chahiye.

enableHighlighterDescription.message: Web page par content highlight karein jise aap Obsidian mein save kar sakte hain.

enableInterpreterDescription.message: Page se data nikalne ke liye natural language ka upyog karein. Udaharan ke liye, aap template syntax $strong_start${{"page ka summary"}}$strong_end$ ka upyog kar sakte hain. Niche configure kiye gaye API key ya custom model ki zarurat hai. $link_start$Aur janein$link_end$

exportAllSettingsDescription.message: Templates aur properties sahit sabhi settings export karein.

exportHighlightsDescription.message: Apne highlights ko file mein export karein.

exportPropertiesDescription.message: Web Clipper properties ko $strong_start$types.json$strong_end$ file mein save karein jise aapke Obsidian vault mein, ya dusre devices par Web Clipper mein import kiya ja sakta hai.

extensionDescription.message: Web se content ko ek private aur durable format mein save karein jise aap offline access kar sakte hain. Obsidian ka official browser extension.

failedToDeleteTemplate.message: Template delete karne mein fail. Kripya dobara koshish karein.

failedToDuplicateTemplate.message: Template duplicate karne mein fail. Kripya dobara koshish karein.

failedToExportHighlights.message: Highlights export karne mein fail. Details ke liye console check karein.

failedToExportSettings.message: Settings export karne mein fail. Details ke liye console check karein.

failedToExtractContent.message: Page content extract karne mein asafal.

failedToImportTemplate.message: Template import karne mein error. File check karein aur dobara koshish karein.

failedToInitialize.message: Kripya extension ko reload karne ki koshish karein.

failedToInitializeContent.message: Page content initialize karne mein asafal.

failedToProcessInterpreter.message: Interpreter processing fail. Kripya dobara koshish karein.

failedToResetProviders.message: Providers aur models reset karne mein fail

failedToResetTemplate.message: Default template reset karne mein fail. Kripya dobara koshish karein.

failedToSaveProvider.message: Provider save karne mein fail. Kripya dobara koshish karein.

feedbackDescription.message: हम वेब क्लिपर को कैसे सुधार सकते हैं? कृपया हमारे सहायता पृष्ठ पर जाएं, जहां आप बग्स की रिपोर्ट कर सकते हैं, सुविधाओं का सुझाव दे सकते हैं, और सामान्य समस्याओं की सहायता प्राप्त कर सकते हैं।

getApiKeyHere.message: Apni $1 API key yahan se prapt karein.

helpDescription.message: Web Clipper ka upyog karna seekhein aur troubleshooting help prapt karein.

importAllSettingsDescription.message: Templates aur properties sahit sabhi settings import karein. Yeh aapki vartaman configuration ko replace karega.

importFailed.message: Import fail. Details ke liye console check karein.

importPropertiesDescription.message: Obsidian se properties import karne ke liye, apne vault mein $strong_1_start$types.json$strong_1_end$ file ko $strong_2_start$.obsidian$strong_2_end$ folder mein dhundhein. Note karein ki yeh folder default roop se adhikansh operating systems mein hidden hota hai.

interpreterContextDescription.message: Prompt variables ki interpretation ke liye upyog kiya jane wala context. $link_start$Interpreter settings$link_end$ mein define kiye gaye default context ko override karta hai. Yahan variables ka upyog kiya ja sakta hai.

languageDescription.message: Extension interface ke liye display language chunein.

legacyModeDescription.message: Obsidian 1.6.7 ya purane version ke saath compatible URI clipping method ka upyog karta hai. Note karein ki aap kitna content clip kar sakte hain woh aapke browser aur OS dwara limited hai. Kuch pages bina kisi errors ke fail ho sakte hain.

modelNameDescription.message: Interface mein display karne ke liye model ka naam.

modelProviderDescription.message: Model provider, jaise Ollama, OpenRouter, Google, etc.

modelRequiredFields.message: Model name, Provider, aur Model ID jaruri hain.

noTemplates.message: Koi templates available nahi hain. Kripya settings mein template add karein.

noteContentDescription.message: Note ka content customize karein. Page se data pre-populate karne ke liye variables ka upyog karein.

noteNameFormatDescription.message: Note ke file name ka format. Aap page se data pre-populate karne ke liye {{title}}, {{date}}, aur {{published}} jaise variables ka upyog kar sakte hain. $link_start$Aur janein$link_end$.

notesAboutPage.message: Is page ke baare mein notes...

onlyHttpSupported.message: Is page ko clip nahi kiya ja sakta. Sirf http aur https URLs supported hain.

openBehaviorDescription.message: चुनें कि वेब क्लिपर डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप से कैसे खुलता है।

pageCannotBeClipped.message: Is page ko clip nahi kiya ja sakta.

pleaseReload.message: Kripya page reload karne ki koshish karein.

popularModelsDescription.message: सामान्य रूप से प्रयुक्त मॉडलों में से चुनें या कस्टम मॉडल विवरण दर्ज करें।

prependToDaily.message: Daily note mein, shuruat mein add karein

prependToExisting.message: Existing note mein, shuruat mein add karein

providerApiKeyDescription.message: Is provider ke liye aapki API key.

providerBaseUrlDescription.message: Is provider ke liye API endpoint URL.

providerModelIdDescription.message: Aapke provider se model ka identifier. Generally spaces ke bina ek short name.

providerNameDescription.message: Is provider ke liye display name.

providerPresetDescription.message: Ek provider chunein ya custom banayein.

providerRequiredFields.message: Provider name aur Base URL jaruri hain.

rateExtensionDescription.message: क्या आप वेब क्लिपर का आनंद ले रहे हैं? हमारी मदद करें इसे रेटिंग देकर।

removeUnusedPropertiesDescription.message: Sabhi properties remove karein jo kisi bhi template mein use nahi ki gayi hain.

resetDefaultTemplateDescription.message: Default template mein kiye gaye sabhi changes ko remove karein.

resetProvidersAndModelsDescription.message: Providers aur models ko default settings par reset karein.

saveBehaviorDescription.message: पेज सहेजने के लिए डिफ़ॉल्ट विकल्प चुनें। वैकल्पिक विकल्प मुख्य बटन के बगल में ड्रॉपडाउन मेनू में दिखाई देते हैं।

selectTemplateToExport.message: Kripya export karne ke liye ek template select karein.

settingsImportSuccess.message: Sabhi settings successfully import ho gayi hain. Changes dekhne ke liye kripya page refresh karein.

shortcutInstructionsBrave.message: Key assignments change karne ke liye, $1 par jayein

shortcutInstructionsChrome.message: Key assignments change karne ke liye, $1 par jayein

shortcutInstructionsDefault.message: Key assignments change karne ke liye, kripya apne browser ki extension settings dekhein.

shortcutInstructionsEdge.message: Key assignments change karne ke liye, $1 par jayein

shortcutInstructionsFirefox.message: Key assignments change karne ke liye, $1 par jayein, gear icon par click karein, aur "Manage Extension Shortcuts" select karein

shortcutInstructionsIntro.message: Keyboard shortcuts aapko clipper features tak quick access dete hain.

shortcutInstructionsSafari.message: Safari par keyboard shortcuts customize nahi kiye ja sakte.

showActionsDescription.message: Clipper menu se page variables inspect karne ki permission deta hai. Templates mein use ke liye available variables dekhne mein helpful.

silentOpen.message: Clipped note ko bina open kiye save karein

silentOpenDescription.message: Clipped notes save ho jayengi lekin naye tab mein nahi khulengi. Obsidian abhi bhi foreground mein layega.

templateCopied.message: Template JSON clipboard par copy ho gaya

templateCopyError.message: Template JSON ko clipboard par copy karne mein fail

templatePropertiesDescription.message: Clipped note ke top par add karne ke liye properties. Page se data pre-populate karne ke liye variables ka upyog karein.

templateTriggersDescription.message: URL pattern se match hone ya schema.org data hone par is template ko automatically select karne ke liye rules define karein. Ek line mein ek rule.

usingLatestVersion.message: Aap latest version use kar rahe hain.

vaultDescription.message: Is template ke liye default vault select karein. Vaults add ya remove karne ke liye $link_start$general settings$link_end$ par jayein.

vaultsDescription.message: By default, clipped notes currently open vault mein save hoti hain. Agar aap different vaults mein save karne ka option chahte hain to aap yahan vaults add kar sakte hain. Vault names Obsidian vault ke name se exactly match karne chahiye. Vault add karne ke liye $strong_start$enter$strong_end$ dabaein.
